class.name: Sprite1D
class.brief_description: A 1D sprite node that displays an image in 1D, one row of pixels at a time. Each row is a frame.
class.description: A node that displays a 1D texture. An un-animated 1D texture is an image with a height of 1 pixel. If the texture has multiple rows of pixels (height greater than 1px), only one row of pixels will be displayed at a time. Each is a 1D frame and the frame can be changed by adjusting [member frame].

method.name: get_frame_count
method.description: Returns the amount of frames available to this [Sprite1D]. This is the same the height of the image. Each row of pixels is a 1D frame.

method.name: get_rect
method.description: Returns a [Rect2] representing the [Sprite1D]'s boundary in local coordinates. Can be used to detect if the [Sprite1D] was clicked. This behaves identically to [Sprite2D]'s method.

members.member: The current frame of the [Sprite1D]. Each row of pixels is a 1D frame.
The texture of the [Sprite1D]. Only one row of pixels will be displayed at a time. If the texture has multiple rows of pixels (height greater than 1), each is a 1D frame.
